title: Mathematics Teacher Competency Development Program Utilizing an Output-Oriented Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Personalized mobile learning environment for adult learners in managerial/leadership roles, incorporating real-time feedback and data analysis via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can operate an instructional design evaluation system utilizing the PSO-SVM model within six months
Learners can produce a lesson design plan applying an output-oriented approach with over 80% completeness
Learners can establish and implement teaching method improvement plans through peer assessment and self-reflection
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
